name: 2-Die
description:
2die is a top-down action shooter in which you control two survivors during Demon Invasion. You’ve got to put down as much demons as you can before they get to you, so your characters watch each other’s back.

In this game you control two characters simultaneously and the only way for them to survive is to survive together. 

Control:

Use mouse to aim and move characters along the circle. Use mouse wheel to change distance between characters.  Use WASD to move characters to different directions. Use left click to shoot and attack.

RollCreators team:

Developer – Vyacheslav Zhuravlev

2D Artists – Andrey Elisafenko, Anna Bespalova

Animations – Andrey Elisafenko

Game Design – Egor Savenko

Used materials from freesound.org and

Homeworld Collapse by Arthur Vyncke | https://soundcloud.com/arthurvost

Music promoted by https://www.free-stock-music.com
